values.name: Innovation & Experimentation
values.description: Embrace creative thinking, new methodologies, and bold experimentation. Use failure as a stepping stone for growth.

values.name: Accountability & Simplicity
values.description: Take ownership of actions, maintain a high Say:Do ratio, deliver impactful results with simplicity and clarity.

values.name: Teamwork & Collaboration
values.description: Foster collaboration, knowledge sharing, and mutual support. Recognize the strength of collective effort and openness to feedback.

values.name: Continuous Learning & Curiosity
values.description: Stay curious, proactively develop skills, and remain leaders in IT innovations through learning and growth.

values.name: Customer Focus & Service Excellence
values.description: Listen actively to customers, align solutions to their needs, deliver exceptional service with adaptability and thought leadership.

values.name: Trust & Autonomy
values.description: Cultivate trust, flexibility, and empowerment. Enable each team member to lead, execute, and drive change confidently.
